channel.title: Mysqls on heapdump
channel.description: Recent content in Mysqls on heapdump

item.title: MySQL查看表结构
item.description: 查看表结构 SELECT * FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'db_name' AND table_name = 'table_name' 查看字段 SELECT * FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'db_name' AND table_name = 'table_name'
